content: Synchronization will allow to upload all the data from the portal and update the new data after changing the settings. Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the functionality of the "Synchronize" toggle button on Portal Settings pages, indicating that it enables syncing portal data with LDAP settings. The text appears in an unavailable state (indicated by a specific class name) and is translated as part of the LdapAutoSyncToggleDescription key.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is a bit awkward and could be improved. The Arabic translation, while technically correct, maintains this awkwardness. A more natural Arabic phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ستقم بالمزامنة في كل مرة تكون لديك بيانات جديدة للمستخدمين في البوابة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sinxronizasiya bütün məlumatların portaldan yüklənməsinə...' is slightly awkward. It would be better to rephrase to improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinxronizasiya portaldan bütün məlumatları yükləməyə və parametrlər dəyişdikdən sonra yeni məlumatları yeniləyəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'sınxronizasiya edin' at the end feels like a command. A more natural phrasing would be advisory.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Portalda istifadəçilər üçün yeni məlumatınız varsa sinxronizasiya etməyi unutmayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'yüklənməsinə' is technically correct, a more natural word choice for 'upload' in this context might be 'daşırmaya'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinxronizasiya portaldan bütün məlumatları daşırmaya və parametrlər dəyişdikdən sonra yeni məlumatları yeniləyəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not fully captured in the Czech translation. The Czech translation implies synchronization happens whenever *any* new data about users appears, whereas the English suggests it's intended to be initiated by the user when *they* have new data.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizujte, když máte na portálu nová data o uživatelích.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation lacks consistent capitalization. 'Synchronizace' should be capitalized at the beginning of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizace umožní nahrát všechna data z portálu a po změně nastavení aktualizovat nová data. Synchronizace probíhá pokaždé, když se na portálu objeví nová data o uživatelích.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not accurately reflected in the German translation. The German phrasing is a bit clunky and doesn't flow as naturally. A more accurate and natural translation would convey the idea of synchronizing whenever new user data exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Synchronisierung sollte jedes Mal durchgeführt werden, wenn neue Benutzerdaten im Portal vorhanden sind.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation uses 'Synchronisieren Sie' (formal 'you'). Consider using the informal 'Synchronisiere' for better user engagement, depending on the portal's tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Synchronisierung sollte jedes Mal durchgeführt werden, wenn neue Benutzerdaten im Portal vorhanden sind. Synchronisiere jedes Mal, wenn...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly informal tone with 'Κάντε συγχρονισμό'. A more formal and professional tone would be better suited for a settings description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αναβαθμίστε τον συγχρονισμό κάθε φορά που έχετε νέα δεδομένα για τους χρήστες στην πύλη.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately reflected in the French translation. "L’espace" is a generic term and doesn't convey the specific meaning of "portal." The overall phrasing is also a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La synchronisation permet de télécharger toutes les données du portail et de mettre à jour les nouvelles données après avoir modifié les paramètres. Synchronisez chaque fois que vous avez de nouvelles données concernant les utilisateurs sur le portail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses 'L’espace' instead of the more formal 'portail', which could create a disconnect with the rest of the interface.  Consistency is important.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent terminology across the entire application. Replacing 'L’espace' with 'portail' is recommended for maintaining consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Սինխրոնիզացիա" is repeated multiple times. While technically correct, it might be stylistically improved. Consider using variations or pronouns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Սինխրոնացման գործընթացը" or using pronouns to avoid repetition.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Սինխրոնիզացրեք ամեն անգամ, երբ պորտալում օգտատերերի մասին նոր տվյալներ ունեք:" feels slightly abrupt and could be rephrased for better flow. The imperative "Սինխրոնիզացրեք" is strong.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a softer phrasing like "Հետևողականորեն սինխրոնացրեք, երբ պորտալում օգտատերերի մասին նոր տվյալներ ունեք:" (Consistently sync when you have new user data in the portal).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Consistency in terminology. Using 'պորտալում' twice feels slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing the second instance with a pronoun or a simplified phrase (e.g., 'ներսում').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is a bit awkward. A more natural Italian translation might be 'Sincronizza ogni volta che hai nuovi dati relativi agli utenti nel portale' or 'Sincronizza ogni volta che ci sono nuovi dati relativi agli utenti nel portale.' The current translation literally translates 'on users' which doesn't quite convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizza ogni volta che hai nuovi dati relativi agli utenti nel portale.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately translated. The Japanese translation implies syncing 'every time' which might be too frequent and confusing for users. A more nuanced translation is needed to convey the intention of syncing when updates occur, not necessarily every time a user is modified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同期は、ポータルに新しいユーザーデータがある場合、またはユーザー情報に変更があった場合に実行してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同期により、ポータルからすべてのデータをアップロードし、設定変更後、ポータルのユーザー情報に新しいデータがあれば更新できます。ユーザー情報に変更があるたびに同期してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is overly literal and not natural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 포털에 사용자 정보가 변경될 때마다 동기화하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow in Korean. The current translation feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 포털의 데이터를 동기화하면, 설정을 변경한 후 새 데이터를 업데이트할 수 있습니다. 포털에 사용자 정보가 변경될 때마다 동기화하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is translated as "ຈົ່ງເຊື່ອມໂອ້ານໃນເວລາທີ່ມີຂໍ້ມູນໃໝ່ກ່ຽວກັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ຢູ່ໃນເວັບໄຊ້ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ".  While technically correct, it's overly literal and sounds unnatural in Lao.  'ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ' (always) is too strong and might imply constant syncing is required, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more nuanced phrasing such as 'ເມື່ອມີຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃໝ່ຢູ່ໃນເວັບໄຊ້' (When there is new user data on the website) or 'ເວລາທີ່ມີຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້ໃໝ່' (When there is new user information).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetitive use of 'Sinhronizējiet' (Synchronize). The text ends with a command that is already explained in the preceding sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhronizējiet reizi, kad portālā ir jauninājumi par lietotājiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data...' is somewhat awkward and direct in the translation. A more natural flow would be to imply the action rather than explicitly stating it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhronizējiet, kad portālā ir jauni dati par lietotājiem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Synchroniseer elke keer als u nieuwe gegevens over gebruikers in de portaal hebt" is grammatically awkward. The use of 'in de portaal' is incorrect.  It should be 'in het portaal'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchroniseer elke keer als u nieuwe gegevens over gebruikers in het portaal hebt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Sync' as 'Synchroniseer' is technically correct, but in this context, a more conversational and less formal translation might be preferred, especially given the original English is relatively informal.  'Synchroniseren' would be a more common choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchroniseren maakt het mogelijk om alle gegevens van het portaal te uploaden en de nieuwe gegevens bij te werken na het wijzigen van de instellingen. Synchroniseer elke keer als u nieuwe gegevens over gebruikers in het portaal hebt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "na temat użytkowników w portalu" sounds slightly awkward. It's technically correct, but less natural than alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: na temat użytkowników na portalu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is not accurately reflected in the Portuguese translation. The English implies a regular synchronization process, whereas the Portuguese just states 'Sincronize sempre que tiver novos dados de usuários no portal', which means 'Synchronize whenever you have new user data in the portal.' This lacks the nuance of a regular/automatic sync.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A sincronização permitirá fazer upload de todos os dados do portal e atualizar os novos dados após alterar as configurações. Sincronize regularmente sempre que houver novos dados de usuários no portal. / A sincronização permite carregar todos os dados do portal e atualizar as novidades após as alterações nas configurações. Sincronize sempre que houver novos dados de usuários no portal para manter os dados atualizados.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "upload all the data" is a bit awkward in Portuguese. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A sincronização permitirá baixar todos os dados do portal e atualizar os novos dados após alterar as configurações.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not as natural as it could be. 'On users' is not the right prepositional phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronize sempre que tiver novos dados de usuários no portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Realizarea sincronizării este necesară de fiecare dată" is too formal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Sync every time". It sounds like a requirement rather than a recommendation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea trebuie făcută de fiecare dată când adăugați date noi despre utilizatori în portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English uses 'upload' and 'update'.  The Romanian uses 'încărcarea' (upload) and 'actualizarea' (update). While technically correct, 'încărcarea' implies a one-time action, while the English implies a repeated upload during synchronization. A stronger synonym for repeated data transfer would be beneficial.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea permite transferul tuturor datelor de pe portal și actualizarea datelor după modificarea setărilor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little clunky. Combining some phrases would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sincronizarea permite transferul tuturor datelor de pe portal și actualizarea acestora după modificarea setărilor. Efectuați sincronizarea de fiecare dată când adăugați date noi despre utilizatori în portal.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetitive phrasing. The phrase 'Синхронизируйте каждый раз, когда у вас появляются новые данные о пользователях на портале' is a direct repetition of the English phrasing and sounds less natural in Russian. While technically correct, it's clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронизируйте при появлении новых данных о пользователях на портале.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is awkwardly translated.  'On users in the portal' doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. A more accurate and natural phrasing is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සමමුහුර්තකරණය පරිශීලකයින් පිළිබඳ නව දත්ත ඇති සෑම අවස්ථාවකම කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'upload' (උඩුගත කිරීමට) might be better translated as 'transfer' or 'synchronize' depending on the precise meaning intended. While 'upload' is understandable, it isn't the most precise or natural choice in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'උඩුගත කිරීමට' with 'transfer' or 'synchronize' (depending on intended meaning).  For example:  'transfer' would be 'රවර්ණය කිරීමට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly disjointed. While understandable, it could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the second sentence for better flow. For example, combining parts of the two sentences to improve readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'upload all the data' is awkwardly translated as 'nahrať všetky údaje'. While technically correct, 'importovať všetky údaje' or 'preložiť všetky údaje' would be more natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizácia umožní importovať všetky údaje z portálu a aktualizovať nové údaje po zmene nastavení. Synchronizujte vždy, keď máte na portáli nové údaje o používateľoch.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of 'Synchronizujte' (imperative form) feels a bit abrupt. It could be softened for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Synchronizácia umožní importovať všetky údaje z portálu a aktualizovať nové údaje po zmene nastavení. Uistite sa, že synchronizujete vždy, keď máte na portáli nové údaje o používateľoch.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal' is a bit awkward and could be improved. The Slovenian translation 'Sinhroniziraj vsakič, ko so na voljo novi podatki o uporabnikih na portalu' is a literal translation but slightly clunky. A more natural flow might be achieved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhronizirajte kadar koli imate nove podatke o uporabnikih na portalu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The imperative 'Sinhroniziraj' (Sync) should probably be 'Sinhronizirajte' to match the formal tone and reflect the plural subject implied by 'data'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sinhronizirajte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'upload all the data' is not accurately translated. 'Отпремање' implies uploading, but the original intent seems to be a two-way synchronization, not just an upload.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронизација ће омогућити слање и примање података са портала...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Sync every time you have new data' could be more natural in Serbian. 'Синхронизујте сваки пут када имате нове податке' is technically correct but sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронизујте када год имате нове информације о корисницима на порталу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'податке' is technically correct, 'информације' might be more appropriate for describing user data in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронизујте када год имате нове информације о корисницима на порталу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Sinhronizujte' is a verb in the imperative mood. While grammatically correct, it might sound overly directive. A more polite or explanatory phrasing might be better suited depending on the overall tone of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider phrasing it as 'Obavezno sinhronizujte' (Mandatory sync) or 'Preporučuje se sinhronizacija' (Synchronization is recommended).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Obavezno sinhronizujte' might be accurate in conveying urgency, the original English suggests a more frequent, but not necessarily mandatory, action. The current translation implies a strict requirement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Sinhronizujte kada imate nove podatke o korisnicima na portalu' to align more closely with the English original.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Senkronizasyon, portaldan tüm verilerin yüklenmesine ve ayarlar değiştirildikten sonra yeni verilerin güncellenmesine olanak sağlayacaktır." is a bit verbose and could be improved for flow.  'Olanak sağlayacaktır' is formal and can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Senkronizasyon, portaldaki tüm verilerin yüklenmesini ve ayarlar değiştirildikten sonra yeni verilerin güncellenmesini sağlar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Portaldaki kullanıcılara ilişkin her yeni veriye sahip olduğunuzda senkronizasyon yapın' is a bit clunky. 'İlişkin' is unnecessary and makes the sentence less direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Portaldaki kullanıcılar için her yeni veriniz olduğunda senkronizasyon yapın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately reflected in the Ukrainian translation. The Ukrainian translation implies that the synchronization *happens* every time, rather than the user initiating it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронізацію слід виконувати щоразу, коли з'являються нові дані про користувачів у порталі.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of "Синхронізація" in close proximity feels somewhat repetitive and unnatural in Ukrainian. While not incorrect, it could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Синхронізація дозволить передати всі дані з порталу та оновити нові дані після зміни параметрів. Виконуйте синхронізацію щоразу, коли з'являються нові дані про користувачів у порталі.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately translated. While the general meaning is conveyed, a more natural Vietnamese phrasing would improve clarity and flow. The word order and phrasing are a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đồng bộ hóa mỗi khi bạn có dữ liệu người dùng mới trong cổng thông tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Repetitive use of 'Đồng bộ hóa' makes the sentence a bit clunky. Consider rephrasing to avoid the repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Việc đồng bộ hóa sẽ cho phép tải lên tất cả dữ liệu từ cổng thông tin và cập nhật dữ liệu mới sau khi thay đổi cài đặt. Thực hiện đồng bộ hóa mỗi khi bạn có dữ liệu người dùng mới trong cổng thông tin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Sync every time you have new data on users in the portal" is not accurately reflected in the Chinese translation. The Chinese translation simply states "每次门户中有新用户数据时都将进行同步" which translates to 'Synchronization will be performed every time there is new user data in the portal.' It lacks the active instruction/suggestion of 'Sync every time...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 同步将允许从门户上传所有数据并在更改设置后更新新数据。当门户有新用户数据时，请同步。
